channel.title: Comments on: Setting up home and office networks with a single line and with wifi extension

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description: I can't recall, but it might have been to set up the 'broadcast' end first and then the 'receiver' followed. I certainly dug around all the options.
item.content:encoded: I can’t recall, but it might have been to set up the ‘broadcast’ end first and then the ‘receiver’ followed. I certainly dug around all the options.

item.title: By: Oskar Larsson
item.dc:creator: Oskar Larsson
item.description: How did you manage to change WiFi channel when in WISP mode? I can't change this on mine... for me the channel stays the same as the WISP WiFi is using - which is not optimal for best performance.
item.content:encoded:
How did you manage to change WiFi channel when in WISP mode?
I can’t change this on mine… for me the channel stays the same as the WISP WiFi is using – which is not optimal for best performance.
